alert.note: Alert for Shoshone (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 05 at 10:41PM MDT until further notice by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Idaho, including the following county, Shoshone. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 934 PM PDT, The Shoshone County Sheriff Office reports widespread high waters and minor flooding throughout the county. This is due to recent rainfall and snow melt. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.15 to 0.30 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will allow the minor flooding to continue. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
